name: Urban Pirate
description: The original petty crime simulator. A flammable mix of turn-based survival and action-packed mini-games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 55 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 55 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard

reviews.review_text: [h1[A Strategic Urban Homeless Survival Game[/h1]         YouTube™ Video:  Urban Pirate || Strategic Urban Homeless Survival Game

Very cool game! It's just like my life... Cryz3r life Simulator! :D Urban Pirate - its game with nice 8bit graphics, retro gameplay and awesome music! I like it. ;) Amazing game! I recommend. ✌  10/10

Steal this game.  better yet  Buy this game.  The thought of these devs out on the streets is a scary one.  Pretty much a drag rat simulator: -hangin with the homebums -running from that law  -trying to change the world one riot at a time -petty theft & -cold chillin in effect  A breath of fresh 40oz in this dreary digital dump

I awaited something awesome like Mafia. Maybe it gets cooler after a while. But a level where to survive 19 days only with shoplifting (hey, I even HAVE money!), getting busted and smoking weed because the bar is closed again is not only tricky but BORING!   Got it from a bundle, but If I would have paied 7 Euros, I would rather refund than giving it another try. Sorry.
